text: Wulun nimen zai nali, siwang duhui zhui shang nimen, jishi nimen zai gaoda de baolei li.” Jiaru yi jian haoshi jianglin tamen, tamen jiu shuo:“Zhe shi cong an la jiang shi de.” Jiaru tamen zaoyu yi jian huaishi, tamen jiu shuo:“Zhe shi ni suoyinqi de.” Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Yiqie dou shi cong an la jiang shi de.” Zhexie minzhong zenme yiju hua ye bu lijie ne?
